Package main

Class CreditAccount

java.lang.Object
main.Account
main.CreditAccount
public class CreditAccount extends Account
Credit Card account information section Allows you to create and keep track of credit expenses

  • Constructor Summary

    CreditAccount(String accountNumber, String accountName, double creditLimit, double balance)
    Partial constructor that sets the account number, accountName, creditLimit, and balance to the Credit Card Account
    CreditAccount(String accountName, String accountNumber, double creditLimit, double balance, double interestRate)
    Total constructor that sets the account name, account number, credit limit, balance and interest rate to the Credit Card Account

    Charges an amount to the credit account, increasing the current balance.
    void
    checkAndUpdateCreditAccount()
    Checks the credit account file to determine the last update date and applies any pending monthly interest if necessary The method ensures that the account is updated for every month that has passed since the last recorded update.

  • Constructor Details

    • CreditAccount

      public CreditAccount(String accountName, String accountNumber, double creditLimit, double balance, double interestRate)
      Total constructor that sets the account name, account number, credit limit, balance and interest rate to the Credit Card Account
      Parameters:
      accountName - Owner of the account
      accountNumber - Number associated with the Credit account
      creditLimit - Limit on the account
      balance - Current balance on the account
      interestRate - Interest charged on a monthly basis

    • CreditAccount

      accountName - Number associated with the account
      creditLimit - Limit on the account
      balance - Current balance on the account

  • Method Details

    • createCreditAccountFile

      public String createCreditAccountFile(String accountName, String accountNumber, double creditLimit, double balance)
      Generates a Credit account file
      Parameters:
      accountName - Name of the person who owns the account
      accountNumber - Account number associated with the account
      creditLimit - Maximum spending limit on the account
      balance - Current balance of the credit account
      Returns:
      Text file containing the information pertaining to the Credit Account + a return message.

      Applies monthly interest to the current balance.
      Parameters:
      interestRate - The monthly interest rate to be applied

    • checkAndUpdateCreditAccount

      public void checkAndUpdateCreditAccount()
      Checks the credit account file to determine the last update date and applies any pending monthly interest if necessary The method ensures that the account is updated for every month that has passed since the last recorded update.

    • makePayment

      public void makePayment(double amount)
      Makes a payment to reduce the current balance.
